QuestData.Title: Infuriating the Emperor
QuestData.Description:
It seems I underestimated Korthek's cowardice. I expected him to be behind the barrier, ready to ambush us. Yet, still he hides.
That allows us a few moments to prepare. We musn't waste them.
While I siphon power off of these immense crystals, you must thin the numbers of the Faithless here. I will grant you a powerful boon to speed you in your task.
When Korthek arrives, he will require our full attention.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Vorrik's Bulwark to defeat $1oa Faithless within the Sacred Sands.
